original_text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother, Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye; and, behold, a beam is in thine own eye?
korean_text: 보라 네 눈 속에 들보가 있는데 어찌하여 형제에게 말하기를 나로 네 눈 속에 있는 티를 빼게 하라 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너는 네 형제에게 어떻게 말하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye
a beam is in thine own eye
